I would highly recommend "Layer Cake" and "Tracker". Both movies have great plots and well-developed characters. "Layer Cake" is a romantic comedy that follows the story of Philip and Julia, two high up on the ladder of success and living their dream. Their marriage seems perfect except they can' t seem to get to spend time with each other owing to Philips' frequent trips. Finally when they decide to spend time together and go away for a few days, only to find their relationship tested in unexpected ways.
"Tracker" is a thrilling action movie that follows the story of Jack and his partner, Tom. Jack's job is to track down criminals who have escaped from prison.  On one assignment, Jack must infiltrate a group of drug dealers who are planning an ambitious drug trafficking operation across several countries. Jack must find out the plans of these drug dealers, their sources of supplies for their operations, and their methods of distributing their products to their customers in different countries.
Jack has no choice but to infiltrate this group of drug dealers, gather all the information he needs about these drug dealers, their sources of supplies for their operations, and their methods of distributing their products to their customers in different countries., and then use that information he gathered during his infiltration into this group of drug dealers, to plan and execute an ambitious drug trafficking operation across several countries, and to ensure that the distribution of this drug trafficking operation across several countries, is carried out according to all the laws and regulations governing the distribution of drugs in those countries.
